title: Gustaf (band)
text:
Gustaf is an American art punk band from Brooklyn, New York. 


== History ==
The group formed in 2018. In 2020, the band released two songs, "Mine" and "Design". In 2021, the band released their debut album, Audio Drag for Ego Slobs, through Royal Mountain Records. On January 10, Gustaf announced details of their sophomore album "Package Pt. 2" out on April 5th, 2024, alongside a new tour.


== Discography ==
Studio albums

Audio Drag for Ego Slobs (2021)
Package Pt 2 (2024)
